ï»¿C? 900/10 RECOMMENDATION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International E evelopment Association Recommendation of the Ccmmittee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed Financing (Emergency Macroeconomic and Fiscal Support Development Policy Financi ig) to the Republic of Guinea The undersigned Committee constitut -d under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of the International Development Associ ition (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the propc sal that the Association extend to the Republic of Guinea a credit in an amount equivalent to SDR 27,OOC,000 and a grant in an amount equivalent to SDR 6,800,000. The purpose of said credit and grant is to ielp the Government of Guinea address the economic impact of the Ebola epidemic. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to extend such a financing, and of the purpose to which the proceeds of 1 he financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the ol inion that the program in support of which the proceeds of such financing are to be applied comes wi hin the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said program is designed to promote the economic development of the Republic of Guinea and is of high c evelopmental priority in the light of the needs of the Republic of Guinea. 3. Accordingly, the Committe, finds that said program merits financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends said program for such assistance.
